nodes.text: Around 20 BBY, a task force was set up by Jedi Master Plo Koon with the objective of capturing the resurgent Sith Lord Darth Maul and his brother, Sith Acolyte Savage Opress. The strike team consisted of Jedi Masters Bruu Jun-Fan, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Ko Solok, Grohto, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, Jedi Padawan Tatsu, and multiple clone troopers.
Solok, Grohto, and Jun-Fan were all slain by the Sith brothers, and the team was ultimately unsuccessful in capturing Maul and Opress.
The Clone Wars: The Sith Hunters (First appearance)
